name: Knowing God
title: Knowing God
author: J. I. Packer
author_background: J. I. Packer (1926-2020), British-born Canadian evangelical theologian in the low church Anglican tradition. A key figure in Reformed Christianity, known for his work on Puritanism and his classic book 'Knowing God'.
notes: Migrated from database on 2025-01-07. Uses reformed-theology prompt templates for theological translation.
